short_summary: 125 HP tractor for Brandon, Manitoba location
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 06 January, 2023 at 2:00 PMEDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The requirement is for the supply and delivery of one 125 HP tractor for their Brandon, Manitoba location.
full_summary:
### Retender 01633-230281 125 HP Tractor
#### Amaising Notice Information
- **Reference Number**: WS3679601180-Doc3773301452
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3679601180

This is a retender for a requirement issued by Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) for the supply and delivery of one 125 HP tractor for their Brandon, Manitoba location.

#### Detailed Information
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: This tender is open to all qualified contractors, subject to Canada's Trade Agreements with Panama, Korea, Chile, Honduras, and Colombia.

#### Submission Requirements
- **Tender Closing Date**: January 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
- **Contact Person**: Wiebe, Lyland (SPAC/PSPC), email: [lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Important Note
All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the specified tender closing date and time. Late submissions will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Additional Resources
- The tender notice and all supporting documentation can be obtained from [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14825362?extsite=MTQ4MjUzNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14825362?extsite=MTQ4MjUzNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contracting Entity
- Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User Entity
- Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
- Address: K.W. Neatby Bldg, 960 Carling Ave, Ottawa, Ontario, K1Y 4X2, Canada.  Please ensure that your email submission meets all the requirements as stated below. Remember that there is no need to reproduce the same
